plumberResearchFull.json:
### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: There is no specific information provided in the sources regarding the Alabama business registration or license details for Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service.
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**: The business is located at 709 Savage Rd, Florala, AL 36442. Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service operates in Florala, Crestview, Laurel Hill, DeFuniak Springs, Opp, Sampson, Andalusia, and all other surrounding towns and cities[1][4].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**: The business is open 24/7, indicating it provides round-the-clock services. However, specific payment methods are not mentioned in the available sources[1].
- **Years in Operation**: There is no information provided about how many years Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service has been in operation.

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**: Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service offers a wide range of services including plumbing, tile floors, walls, complete remodels, and other handyman services. Specific services include plumbing repairs, plumbing pipe repairs, and drain cleaning[1][3].
- **Service Areas Covered**: As mentioned, the service areas include Florala, Crestview, Laurel Hill, DeFuniak Springs, Opp, Sampson, Andalusia, and surrounding towns and cities[1][4].
- **Emergency Service Availability**: The business provides 24-hour emergency services in the plumbing field[1].
- **Prices or Rates**: There is no detailed pricing information available, but one customer review mentions that the services are "a little pricey," though this is noted in the context of general price increases[1].

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**: The business has a 5-star rating based on 3 customer reviews. One customer praised Jay for his quick response, professionalism, and clear explanations. Another customer described Jay as "wonderful, fast, and does an excellent job every time we have needed"[1].
- **BBB Rating and Status**: There is no information provided in the sources about a BBB (Better Business Bureau) rating or status for Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service.
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**: Customers appreciate Jay's professionalism, quick response times, and the quality of his work. Some mention that the services are a bit pricey but acknowledge the overall value[1].
- **Response to Reviews**: There is no information available on how the business responds to customer reviews.

### Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**: The owner and operator of Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service is Jason, who is actively involved in the business and interacts directly with customers[1].
- **Staff Qualifications**: There is no detailed information provided about the qualifications or certifications of the staff beyond the owner's personal involvement and expertise.
- **Professional Certifications**: No specific professional certifications are mentioned in the available sources for Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service or its staff[1][3][4].
aboutUs: Serving the Florala, Crestview, Laurel Hill, DeFuniak Springs, Opp, Sampson, Andalusia, and surrounding areas, Jay's Plumbing and Handyman Service is a trusted local expert in comprehensive plumbing solutions. Our skilled technicians specialize in plumbing repairs, pipe repairs, drain cleaning, and a wide range of handyman services including tile work and complete remodels. With a commitment to professionalism and quality workmanship, we strive to exceed your expectations on every job.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with our 24/7 emergency plumbing services, ensuring your needs are met promptly and efficiently, day or night.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times and clear communication, so you're never left waiting or wondering about the status of your project.
Meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to doing the job right the first time, saving you from costly callbacks or rework.
A comprehensive range of plumbing and handyman services under one roof, providing a convenient one-stop solution for all your home repair and renovation needs.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tracy Harbuck
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
I googled plumbers in my town, jays popped up so i called left a voicemail he called me back fairly quick! I needed my ice and water hooked up for my new refrigerator he came the next day to look at my hook ups and followed up the next day to fix it! He explained everything very clearly. Super nice, professional and understanding.  A little pricey but in all fairness everything has become so pricey. He did eagerly show up to get the job done, right!
I plan on calling on him for a couple other jobs! Thanks Jay 😁
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Glad to help let us know if you need anything
